welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lewisville, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore everything the city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Alex's Grill & Ice Cream
restaurants.description: Alex's Grill & Ice Cream is a burger joint located in Lewisville.

restaurants.name: Monte De Rey
restaurants.description: Monte De Rey is a mexican restaurant located in Clemmons.

restaurants.name: West Town Restaurant
restaurants.description: West Town Restaurant is a american restaurant located in Winston-Salem.

restaurants.name: Ronni's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Ronni's Restaurant is a wings joint located in Clemmons.
restaurants.address: 1615 Lewisville Clemmons Rd (Holder Rd.), Clemmons, NC 27012

restaurants.name: Mario's Pizza
restaurants.description: Mario's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Clemmons.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, British Airways, and Qantas.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Air Canada, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for all airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.
